body.name: Fixwal 8-Tier Shoe Rack, 26-30 Pairs Shoe Rack Organizer, Large Metal Shoe Rack Shelf, Black Shoe Storage Organizer for Closet, Entryway and Bedroom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 55 mins
features: 【Large Space】 The shoe rack is 33.46" x 12" x 48.81" in size and can store up to 26-30 pairs adult shoes, with different height design, it can fit boots, high heels or slippers. With 2 side hooks, you can hang a lot of things on it.

【Durable & Sturdy】The shoe rack is made of 13mm metal tubes and high-quality connectors, and the metal pipes add an anti-rust coating process that greatly improves the service life, and its robust structure ensures stability and durability, enabling it to withstand the weight of multiple pairs of shoes.

【Waterproof and Easy to Clean】The shoe rack shelf has 7 pcs PP sheets, you can install them on the shoes rack. The PP cloth can prevent dust, water and oil fall into other shoes. These plastic sheets are made of pp material, environmentally friendly, harmless, durable, waterproof and easy to clean.

【Stackable & Dividable】: The metal shoe rack organizer is stackable and dividable, so you can split the shoe stand into 1 4-tier and 1 3-tier shoe storage organizer. And you can split it into a number of small shoe racks through your creative DIY, and put them in different places to organize shoes, such as: wardrobe, garage, corridor, wardrobe, cabinet, entrance channel and so on.
【Easy to Assemble】This shoe organizer includes gloves and a small hammer, making assembly quick and hassle-free. Simply follow the instructions and enjoy your new shoe rack in no time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fixwal is committed to creating simple and organized home life with higher quality and more reasonable prices. We hope to create better living experience for your limited space. Our products provide solutions for organizing and decorating your daily space, helping you to stay away from clutter. Simple life starts from home! Fixwal 8 Tiers Shoe Rack Organizer ·Size: 33.46"W x 12"D x 48.81"H ·Large Space: Our shoe rack for closet can store up to 26-30 pairs adult shoes, with different height design, it can fit boots, high heels or slippers. ·2 Versatile hooks: You can hang a lot of things on shoe stand. ·Durable & Sturdy: Stable durable shoe tower shoe storage organizer. ·DIY Assembly：You can DIY your desired shape according to your home needs, satisfying various scenarios.

Sturdy Metal Tube High quality metal pipe ensure long time use. Waterproof PP Sheets The fabric is waterproof and not easily damaged. Quality Connectors The mid-rod support strengthens the overall structure.

Versatile Hanging Hooks With side hooks, this shoe rack shelf provides additional storage options. Larger layer spacing Larger layer spacing design for storing boots and plants. Stable Support Strong base make the shoe rack durable and stable.

QA： Q1: Is assembly difficult? A1. Easy to install, with installation instructions, small wooden hammer and gloves for quick installation. Q2: Is it stable to use? A2: Yes, this shoe rack organizer is made of the 13mm metal frames and durable non-woven fabric layers, can fit 26-30 pairs of shoes. Q3: How many shoes can be placed on one layer of the shoe rack? A:3 Up to 2-3 pairs of shoes. The size of this shoe rack is 33.46"W * 12"D * 48.81"H, and the layer distance is 6.3''. Q4: Can this shoe rack be disassembled? A4: Yes, any layer of the shoe rack can be disassembled, so that one shoe rack becomes two shoe racks, or the layer spacing can be adjusted to meet the needs of placing boots. Q5: What is the tallest shoe or item that can be placed on the shelf? A5: The shoe organizer has 8 layers, the height of the middle can be adjusted by increasing or reducing the number of layers, the highest 48.8'', each height 6.3'', can be adjusted according to your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It’s the perfect size and does a great job holding up shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There was supposed to be 5 of double holed section connectors and I only got 4. I had to deal with what I had and missed out on 3 selves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Shoe Storage Rack
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack is one of the best I’ve come by due to being able to switch the layout of the storage. I am able to store a lot of shoes on here, like two-three pairs on the racks. It was very easy to put up, but did take long than expected because there’s a lot of pieces. It’s made of plastic and metal, but does the job very well and I have not had any issues. I didn’t use all of the pieces due to it becoming too large for my closet. A very nice, versatile, and simple shoe rack that brings a lot of storage to your closet and organization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: This is a simple designed shoe rack perfect to put in a laundry room or somewhat hidden from the entry way, as the shoe rack has more of an industrial look.
